name: humhub
description: HumHub is a flexible social networking platform that can be used for communities, intranets and collaboration spaces. It offers user profiles, groups, streams, modules and permissions, all running on your own server.

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Customizable user profiles with photos, information, and activity streams

features.title: Spaces And Groups
features.description: Organize users into spaces with separate content streams and permissions

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and share files within spaces with version control

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: Shared calendars for events and meetings within spaces

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for polls, wikis, tasks, and more

features.title: Permission Management
features.description: Granular control over who can see and do what in each space
